title: "Free Skin Promotion"
body: Honestly, why does EU Na and all of those still get free promotional skins, but oce cant? What you got against us riot. And how you say on the support page we can actually get it on oce.

replies.body: send a ticket to support, i have all three

Chained Alistar: Send a support ticket saying that you subscribed to their youtube channel and they should add it manually to your account.
Dread Knight Garen (I think that's how you spell it): Just follow them on twitter I think
Riot Girl Tristana: Follow their Facebook page I think :P
and I think that's all the skins you can get for free from riot, unless you include the future free skins that brofresco was talking about (hextech annie etc.)

Hey Talon12,

Which free skin promotions are you talking about?

Riot Girl Tristana(RGT) is open to all servers except OCE, the support page advertising the "promotional skins" advertises RGT as available to OCE, but infact OCE is the only server which did not have access to it, so either the support page is wrong, or the facebook page is wrong. I see this as unfair on oce seeing as they already do not have the option to get unchained alistar like Na and EUW etc.

Considering the [support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-) was also updated not that long ago and it states that OCE may infact still be eligible for the RGT skin, therefore it should be, but apparently [it has "expired" for OCE](https://www.facebook.com/LeagueOfLegendsOceania/app/174961479209942), but the other regions still have full access?

There is even an entire [article 
](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751824-How-to-add-Facebook-Tristana-to-your-account) from the support telling you how to get it, even though it is (hopefully shall only be currently) impossible.

Dreadknight works in full so that is fine, and unchained Alistair is not and never was available to oce, so that is validated. The problem stemming from this is likely a mistake from riot, which i wish to be cleared up.

I can confirm Riot Girl Trist is available for OCE. Please visit this page if you're having trouble redeeming her (resets the code you get); https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751824-How-to-add-Facebook-Tristana-to-your-account
